title: Optimization of green silver nanoparticles as nanofungicides for management of rice bakanae disease
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Quazi Shireen Akhter Jahan, Ziniya Sultana, Md. Asad Ud-Daula, Md. Ashikuzzaman, Md. Shamim Reja, Md. Mahfuzur Rahman, Amina Khaton, Md. Abul Kashem Tang, M. Safiur Rahman, Hossain Md. Faruquee, Seung Ju Lee, A.T.M. Mijanur Rahman
